'''Myrtle Burrows''' was a Hobbit of [[the Shire]].

==History==
She was the third child and only daughter of [[Milo Burrows|Milo]] and [[Peony Baggins|Peony Burrows]]. When she was eight years old, with her family, she was present at Bilbo's famous [[Bilbo's Farewell Party|Birthday Party]], in {{SR|1401}}.<ref>{{App|Baggins}}</ref>

==Etymology==
The name ''Myrtle'' refers to the [[wikipedia:Myrtus|genus of plants]] with evergreen leaves, white-pink flowers and fragrant berries. The name derives from ancient Greek ''μύρτος'' through Latin.<ref>[http://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/myrtus#Etymology Wiktionary entry]''</ref>
